description: A container representing a single page of a NavigationView widget.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

parent.description: Returns the `NavigationView` the `Page` is hosted in or `null` if it has no parent.

appendTo.description: Appends this widget to the given `NavigationView` instance.

insertBefore.description: Inserts this widget directly before the given `Page`.

insertAfter.description: Inserts this widget directly after the given `Action`.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: A selector expression or a predicate function to filter the results.

siblings.description: Returns a (possibly empty) collection of all siblings of this widget that match the given selector.

image.description: An image to be displayed in the navigation bar

title.description: The page title to be displayed in the navigation bar.

autoDispose.description: Defines whether this page will be automatically disposed when popped from the NavigationView, e.g. using native back navigation.

appear.description: Fired when the page is about to become visible, i.e. it has become the active page.

disappear.description: Fired when the page is no longer visible, i.e. another page has become the active page.
